protocol.text: Leaves were inoculated with PstDc3000 at 10^6cfu/ml or with water. Tissues were harvested at 24hrs post inoculation
Plants were grown in short day environment (8hrs light/16 hrs dark) for 5 weeks at 20C.

Trizol extraction according to the manufacturer instruction. The total RNA was then DNAse treated using the Qiagen DNAse. Purification was performed using the RNAeasy columns following the manufacturer instruction
Biotinylated cRNA were prepared according to the standard Affymetrix protocol from 5ug total RNA (Expression Analysis Technical Manual, 2001, Affymetrix).
Following fragmentation, 10 ug of cRNA were hybridized for 16 hr at 45C on Arabidopsis Genome ATH1 microarray. GeneChips were washed and stained in the Affymetrix Fluidics Station 400.
GeneChips were scanned using the Affymetrix GeneChipÂ® Scanner 3000
background corrected using RMA, quantile normalized, values summarised by median-polish
